pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This video captures a picturesque rural landscape on a bright, sunny day. The scene is filled with lush, rolling green hills, fields, and trees under a vibrant blue sky with white clouds. The camera moves at a high speed, creating a dynamic and blurred perspective of the idyllic countryside.
